methods.guide: All provided checkout information will be securely encrypted.

guide.label: Instruction
steps: After payment, the commodity will be delivered to the EF locker within 4 working days
Customer will receive SMS verification code after commodity arrived EF locker
User touch the locker screen and get started. Press the ‘Pick Up’ button
Follow the instruction and enter the 6-digit verification code from the SMS
The Grid door will be opened automatically
Please close the grid door in order to finish the entire process. No additional fee will be charged
guide.notice: Customer need to pick up the commodity within 48-hour (include Public Holiday). Customer may have to pay extra fee for additional delivery.
